caption: In a desolate desert, a group of people walked on, led by a woman with a dragon perched on her shoulder, but they all seemed to be in dire straits. They eventually halted at a spot because the woman's horse had perished. She knelt beside the horse, looking utterly despondent. It appeared that their tribe had reached a dead-end, but the woman remained resolute.At this moment, another man stepped forward and engaged in conversation with the woman. She issued some instructions to him, and the man mounted his horse and rode into a snowy area. Meanwhile, a few people squatted beside a wooden house, but their activities remained a mystery.
